title: #606: Support Local Ranchers With Doug Lindamood
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Cattle Rancher Doug Lindamood to discuss the importance of knowing how your food was produced and why we need to give back to our communities by supporting local farmers. I am telling you this is an all time banger. Thank you for your support.
